Name: Energy Invasion
About the game: Energy Invasion - an arcade game inspired by the classic Breakout. Unlike the original game, your ball does not break blocks on its own, but can launch missiles in a chosen direction. The game is designed for a controller, but the ability to control with the keyboard and mouse is also present. Features: - A lot of bonuses (both useful and harmful) - Bright graphic effects - Levels with dangerous enemies - Soundtrack from Nick R 61 (19 tracks in the game and 7 bonus-tracks, available separately) - 25 levels in 'Invasion' mode, 25 levels in 'Linear' mode, âˆž levels in 'Endless' mode
